head.title: Furniture, Some of It Sat Upon, in Chelsea

hedline.hl1: Furniture, Some of It Sat Upon, in Chelsea

block.p: Furnished Quarters, which rents out furnished apartments in various cities, is selling new and slightly used furniture and some antiques in Chelsea. Hundreds of items -- sofas, chairs, dining tables, beds, end tables -- are priced as much as 75 percent below retail. Leather Thayer Coggin chairs, $2,800 new, are $1,199, and Sealy queen-size sofa beds, normally $1,400, are $699. The sale, through September, is at a temporary storefront at 26 West 25th Street. Hours vary, so it's wise to call ahead: (212)989-5216.
